name: Super Gun Land
description:
Made for Miz Jam: https://itch.io/jam/miz-jam-1

You must delve into dangerous adventure to save your mermaid girlfriend from evil cosmic horror-based cult.

Controls:

  • Left/Right: Move left or right
  • Up/Down: Aim up or down
  • Z: Jump
  • X: Shoot
  • A/S: Switch weapons
